summary: Frontend thermal simulation testing PASSED - All updated thermal rates work correctly. BLOW_TEMP=175°C, HEAT_BASE_RATE=3°C/sec, COOL_RATE=2°C/sec all verified.
passed_tests: Thermal timing: 2-pill driver heats at ~3.2°C/sec (expected ~3°C/sec) - PASS
Thermal timing: 4-pill final heats at ~2.3°C/sec (expected ~2.1°C/sec) - PASS
Thermal timing: Final amp (4-pill) heats slower than driver (2-pill) due to more thermal mass - PASS
Thermal cooling: Temps cool at ~2°C/sec (43°C → 33°C in 5s) - PASS
Multi-cycle: Temps continue across key-down/un-key cycles (32°C → 42°C after 3s) - PASS
Blown pill threshold: Triggers at exactly 175°C (was 150°C) - PASS
Blown pill timing: 2-pill driver blows at ~48 seconds continuous key-down (expected ~50s) - PASS
Blown pill indicator: 'BLOWN PILL' text appears with RESET button - PASS
Reset button: Resets temp to 25°C and clears blown indicator - PASS
TempBar visual: Bar fills correctly with max at 175°C
critical_code_review_comments: Thermal constants in RFContext.js correctly updated: BLOW_TEMP=175, HEAT_BASE_RATE=3, COOL_RATE=2
TempBar component correctly calculates percentage as (temp-25)/(175-25) for 100% at 175°C
thermalMass calculation uses sqrt(transistors/2) which correctly gives 1.0 for 2-pill and 1.414 for 4-pill
The useRef pattern for stale closure fix continues to work correctly from iteration_4
context_for_next_testing_agent: Thermal simulation fully verified with realistic 2SC2879 model. Key timings: 2-pill heats ~3°C/sec, 4-pill heats ~2.1°C/sec, cooling ~2°C/sec, blow at 175°C after ~48-50s for 2-pill. All thermal features (heat, cool, multi-cycle, blown pill, reset) working correctly.
